text: Matthew J. Munn (born July 1980) is an American voice actor and animator for many studios. He voiced Boog and Doug in Open Season 3. He replaced Mike Epps as the voice of Boog in Open Season 2 (who replaced Martin Lawrence from the first movie). He was later replaced by Donny Lucas in Open Season: Scared Silly. == References == Category:1980 births Category:Living people Category:American voice actors Category:American animators
title: Matthew J. Munn
